paragraphs.text:
%md
## Selecting a Good Wine!
### Let's use ADW's in-database machine learning algorithms and Oracle Machine Learning to select a good wine.   Based on the Kaggle competition WineReviews130K data (https://www.kaggle.com/zynicide/wine-reviews), let's see if we can find a tastly beverage!  
#### WineReviews130K data = 130k wine reviews with variety, location, winery, price, and description

### Steps
#### 1. Explore the data
#### 2. Define the Target Attribute (GT_90_Points = More than 90 points)
#### 3. Find the Key Attributes that Most Influence POINTS_BIN
#### 4. Build a Machine Learning Model to Predict Good Wines to Buy

msg.data:
Selecting a Good Wine!

Let's use ADW's in-database machine learning algorithms and Oracle Machine Learning to select a good wine. Based on the Kaggle competition WineReviews130K data (https://www.kaggle.com/zynicide/wine-reviews), let's see if we can find a tastly beverage!

WineReviews130K data = 130k wine reviews with variety, location, winery, price, and description

Steps

1. Explore the data

2. Define the Target Attribute (GT_90_Points = More than 90 points)

3. Find the Key Attributes that Most Influence POINTS_BIN

4. Build a Machine Learning Model to Predict Good Wines to Buy

paragraphs.title: Define Attribute Importance Model Settings
paragraphs.text:
%script

CREATE TABLE Att_Import_Mode_Settings ( 
  setting_name  VARCHAR2(30), 
  setting_value VARCHAR2(30));

paragraphs.title: Build Attribute Importance Model
paragraphs.text:
%script

BEGIN
   DBMS_DATA_MINING.CREATE_MODEL(
     model_name 	  	    => 'GOOD_WINE__AI',
     mining_function		=> DBMS_DATA_MINING.ATTRIBUTE_IMPORTANCE,
     data_table_name		=> 'WineReviews130K',
     case_id_column_name 	=> 'ID',
     target_column_name	    => 'POINTS_BIN',
     settings_table_name 	=> 'Att_Import_Mode_Settings');
END;
/

paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT * from(
SELECT ID, PREDICTION_PROBABILITY(Wine_CLASS_MODEL, 'GT_90_POINTS'  USING A.*) prob
 FROM Wine_APPLY_RESULT A)
 WHERE prob > 0.2;
